thisisatest

Connect to thisisatest, from R

Introduction

The thingie is a multi-platform build and check service for R packages. The thisisatest packages uses the thisisatest API to connect to the thisisatest builder and start package checks on various architectures: Run R CMD check on any of the thisisatest builder architectures, from R.

The thisisatest package also supports accessing statuses of previous checks, and local use of the thisisatest Linux platforms via Docker.
